LCPDPU.original: Member of the North Holland Hustlers street gang.

-Puerto Rican mechanic and fence for stolen cars.
-Ties to the illegal street racing scene and the Spanish Lords.
-Avid body builder and steroid user.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 波多黎各裔机械师，从事汽车销赃。
- 与非法街头赛车圈及西班牙领主帮密切相关。
- 热衷于健身，类固醇使用者。

LCPDPU.original:
1987 - Possession Controlled Substance: Crack Cocaine
1989 - Possession Controlled Substance: Crack Cocaine
1990 - Assault On A Police Officer
1996 - Tax Evasion
LCPDPU.translated:
1987 - 持有管制物质：霹雳可卡因
1989 - 持有管制物质：霹雳可卡因
1990 - 袭警
1996 - 逃税

LCPDPU.original:
-Small time Dukes-based Irish American hood.
-Works closely with Michael Keane and Patrick McReary, brother of the Pegorino Crime family associate, Gerald McReary.
-Suspected in a number of hijackings and robberies.
-Frequents several known bookmakers.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 以Dukes为据点的爱尔兰裔小混混。
- 与Michael Keane及Patrick McReary合作紧密，后者为Pegorino犯罪家族同伙Gerald McReary的弟弟。
- 涉嫌参与多起抢劫。
- 常找几个赌注登记人下注。

LCPDPU.original:
2004 - Petit Larceny
2005 - Possession Controlled Substance: Methamphetamine
LCPDPU.translated:
2004 - 小额盗窃
2005 - 持有管制物质：冰毒

LCPDPU.original: Known Associate of Mikhail Faustin. Linked to Russian Organized Crime Syndicates throughout Liberty City.
LCPDPU.translated: Mikhail Faustin的同伙。与自由城的俄罗斯系犯罪组织有联系

LCPDPU.original:
-Rich celebutante, regular face on Algonquin party circuit.
-History of alcohol-related offenses.
-Believed to be a cocaine addict.
-Engaged to backing dancer, Tyler Dixon.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 富家女，Algonquin交际圈常客。
- 有饮酒相关的犯罪历史。
- 据信其吸食可卡因成瘾。
- 已与舞团舞者Tyler Dixon订婚。

LCPDPU.original: Linked to Russian Organized Crime Syndicates throughout Liberty City.
LCPDPU.translated: 与自由城的俄罗斯系犯罪组织有联系

LCPDPU.original: Known associate of the McReary family.

-Cousin of chop shop operator, Lyle Rivas.
-Known homosexual hustler and con man.
-Often charms older gay (sometimes married) men before emptying their bank accounts and disappearing.
-Based in Broker.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 地下拆车厂厂主Lyle Rivas的堂弟。
- 同性恋卖淫者、诈骗犯。
- 常色诱大龄男同性恋(有时是已婚男同)，随后卷走他们的银行存款并就此消失。
- 以Broker为据点。

LCPDPU.original:
1996 - Grand Theft Auto
1999 - Possession Stolen Vehicles
2005 - Reckless Endangerment
LCPDPU.translated:
1996 - 汽车盗窃
1999 - 持有赃车
2005 - 怠忽致危

LCPDPU.original: Linked to drug dealers in North Holland as well as the Lost OMG, Irish-Americans in Dukes and West Indians in East Liberty City.
LCPDPU.translated: 与North Holland的毒贩、失落非法机车俱乐部、Duke的爱尔兰裔、自由城东部的西印度群岛裔有关

LCPDPU.original:
-Diamond dealer thought to be linked to various Organized Crime Syndicates.
-Arrested in connection to an operation importing illegal conflict diamonds from Africa.
-Works closely with Mori Green.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 被认为与多个犯罪组织有关的钻石商人。
- -因与从非洲走私非法血钻行为有关被捕。
- 与Mori Green合作紧密。

LCPDPU.original: Linked to Criminal Underworld in Ireland and Irish American criminals based in Dukes and Alderney.
LCPDPU.translated: 与爱尔兰黑社会及以Dukes及Alderney为据点的爱尔兰裔犯罪者有联系

LCPDPU.original:
-Recent immigrant to Liberty City from Egypt.
-Arrested selling counterfeit handbags in Suffolk.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 近期由埃及移民至自由城。
- 因贩卖高仿手提包于Suffolk被捕。

LCPDPU.original:
-Believed to be the "Old Lady" of Johnny Klebitz, a senior member of the Lost OMG.
-Believed to be a methamphetamine addict.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 据信其为失落非法机车俱乐部高级成员Johnny Klebitz的「老娘们」。
- 据信其吸食冰毒成瘾。

LCPDPU.original:
-Prior murder convictions in Russia.
-Exploited a loophole in the immigration treaty to gain US residency in the mid 90s.
-Believed to be the right hand of Mikhail Faustin, the Russian national in control of organized crime in the Hove Beach area.
-Reported dealings with Russian mobster Kenny Petrovic and members of the Ancelotti Crime Syndicate.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 先前在俄罗斯犯下多起谋杀。
- 90年代中期利用移民协议的漏洞取得美国国籍。
- 据信其为Hove Beach一带俄罗斯系犯罪组织头目Mikhail Faustin的左膀右臂。
- 报告指出其与俄罗斯黑道Kenny Petrovic及Ancelotti犯罪家族成员有往来。

LCPDPU.original:
1995 - Prostitution
1998 - Prostitution
1999 - Coercion: Blackmail
2003 - Possession Controlled Substance: Methamphetamine
2004 - Fraud
LCPDPU.translated:
1995 - 参与卖淫
1998 - 参与卖淫
1999 - 胁迫勒索
2003 - 持有管制物质：冰毒
2004 - 诈骗

LCPDPU.original:
-Immigrated to the US in 1985.
-Believed to be operating a stable of prostitutes in Alderney City made up of South American illegal immigrants and US national runaways.
-Alleged to have first started pimping on the street of Lima, Peru at the age of 8.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 于1985移民美国。
- 据信其在Alderney市有一支由南美非法移民及美国逃犯组成的妓女集团。
- 据传其8岁开始在秘鲁首都利马的街上拉皮条。

2000 - 汽车盗窃
2002 - 故意伤害

LCPDPU.original: Member of the Alderney Chapter of the Lost OMG
LCPDPU.translated: 失落非法机车俱乐部Alderney分会成员

LCPDPU.original:
-Alderney-based Italian American hood.
-Involved in small time criminal activities.
-Believed to be trying to work his way up through the Pegorino crime family.
-Works for Ray Boccino and often seen with Joe "Tuna" DiLeo and Johnny "Spaz" Barbosa.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 以Alderney为据点的意大利裔混混。
- 据信其试图在Pegorino犯罪家族中取得地位。
- 替Ray Boccino工作，常与Joe "Tuna" DiLeo和Johnny "Spaz" Barbosa一起被目击。

LCPDPU.original:
-Nightclub entrepreneur believed to have links to organized crime, particularly the Ancelotti Crime Syndicate, though the DA's office has not managed to make any of the charges stick.
-Often seen in the company of Gracie Ancelotti, daughter of the Crime Syndicate's head.
-Recent raids have taken place to check the safety standards and underage admittance policy of his Algonquin clubs - Hercules and Maisonette 9.
-Employs associate of Northwood drug dealers, Luis Fernando Lopez, as a personal bodyguard.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 夜店大亨，据信其与犯罪组织有联系，尤其是Ancelotti犯罪家族，不过地方检察官至今未能落实任何一项指控。
- 常被目击与犯罪家族头目之女Gracie Ancelotti在一起。
- 近期对其名下的两家Algonquin夜总会(大力神及9号豪宅)的安全标准及未成年人禁入情况进行了突击检查。
- 雇佣Northwood的一名毒贩，Luis Fernando Lopez，为私人保镖。

LCPDPU.original:
1970 - Disorderly Conduct
1971 - Civil Disobedience
1974 - Resisting Arrest
1978 - Armed Robbery
1986 - Grand Larceny
1999 - Armed Robbery
LCPDPU.translated:
1970 - 扰乱社会治安
1971 - 公民不服从
1974 - 拒捕
1978 - 武装抢劫
1986 - 大额盗窃
1999 - 武装抢劫

LCPDPU.original:
2004 - Arson
2004 - Arson
2005 - Arson
2006 - Arson
2007 - Arson
2007 - Arson

-Member of the Alderney Chapter of the Lost OMG.
-Believed to be running a methamphetamine lab.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 失落非法机车俱乐部Alderney分会成员。
- 据信其运营着一间冰毒制作实验室。

LCPDPU.original:
-Small time Albanian thug.
-Believed to be part of a money lending and extortion operation that targets illegal immigrants when they arrive in US.
-Based in Hove Beach.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 阿尔巴尼亚小混混。
- 据信其系一名针对刚到美国的非法移民进行放贷的敲诈组织成员。
- 以Hove Beach为据点。

LCPDPU.original: Linked to Russian and Eastern European criminals in Hove Beach.
LCPDPU.translated: 与Hove Beach的俄罗斯及东欧犯罪者有联系

LCPDPU.original:
2003 - Driving While Intoxicated
2005 - Driving While Intoxicated
2006 - Possession Controlled Substance: Cocaine
LCPDPU.translated:
2003 - 酒驾
2005 - 酒驾
2006 - 持有管制物质：可卡因

LCPDPU.original:
-Small time dealer during the crack boom of the early 90s.
-Avoided arrest by becoming a police informant.
-His testimony was crucial in several high profile convictions including that of Dwayne Forge.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 90年代早期霹雳可卡因爆发时的小毒贩。
- 借由成为警方线人避免被捕。
- 其证言在为包括Dwayne Forge在内的数名高位罪犯定罪时起到重要作用。

LCPDPU.original:
1969 - Hijacking
1972 - Customs Violation: Tobacco Import
1973 - Promoting Gambling
1974 - Manslaughter
1985 - Racketeering
LCPDPU.translated:
1969 - 汽车抢劫
1972 - 烟草走私
1973 - 聚众赌博
1974 - 过失杀人
1985 - 涉黑

LCPDPU.original:
-Head of the previously small time Alderney based Pegorino Crime Syndicate which he took over from his father.
-Attempting to control rackets being run by the five Algonquin families but his power is questionable.
-Main associates are Phil Bell and Ray Boccino.
-Ties to Irish American hoods such as Gerald McReary in Dukes.
-Lives in Alderney with his wife, Angie.
-Owns the Honkers Gentlemen's Club in Tudor.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 以Alderney为据点的Pegorino犯罪家族的头目，继承自其父，先前帮派规模较小。
- 试图掌控原先由Algonquin五大家族经营的涉黑活动，但其能力令人怀疑。
- Phil Bell及Ray Boccino的主要同伙。
- 与爱尔兰裔小混混关系密切，例如Dukes的Gerald McReary。
- 与其妻子Angie一起住在Alderney。
- 位于Tudor的Honkers绅士俱乐部系其名下。

LCPDPU.original:
2000 - Incest
2001 - Patronize Prostitute
2004 - Patronize Prostitute
2005 - Disorderly Conduct
2006 - Public Lewdness
LCPDPU.translated:
2000 - 乱伦
2001 - 容留卖淫
2004 - 容留卖淫
2005 - 扰乱社会治安
2006 - 流氓行为

LCPDPU.original:
-Associate of Derrick McReary and Aiden O'Malley.
-Suspected in the string of robberies for which O'Malley was convicted but, despite McReary's testimony, charges did not stick.
-Recently suspected of running a small time car stealing and larceny operation in Alderney.
LCPDPU.translated:
- Derrick McReary及Aiden O'Malley的同伙。
- 涉嫌参与多起O'Malley已被定罪的抢劫，尽管有McReary的证言，仍然未能落实对其的指控。
- 近期涉嫌组织参与在Alderney的小规模偷车活动及盗窃活动。

1993 - 汽车抢劫
1995 - 武装抢劫
1997 - 过失杀人

LCPDPU.original:
-Senior member of the Ancelotti Crime Syndicate.
-Believed to manage the relationship between the Ancelottis and their Albanian muscle.
LCPDPU.translated:
- Ancelotti犯罪家族高级成员。
- 据信其负责Ancelotti家族与他们的阿尔巴尼亚打手间的事务。

LCPDPU.original:
-Confessed to having started a number of fires that had previously been blamed on Terrorism.
-N.O.O.S.E believes that she was brainwashed by terrorists into lighting fires.
-Groups in the Midwest claim that she has the mark of the Devil and is possessed by an evil spirit.
-When not lighting fires, she enjoys needle work and soccer.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 供认先前被认为是恐怖袭击的几起纵火案系其所为。
- N.O.O.S.E认为其纵火行为系被恐怖分子洗脑所致。
- 中西部的一些组织宣称其身上有魔鬼的印记，还称其被魔鬼附身。
- 不纵火时，其爱好针线活及足球。

LCPDPU.original:
1973 - Grand Theft Auto
1974 - Possession Stolen Property
1976 - Armed Robbery
1979 - Grand Larceny

LCPDPU.translated:

2005 - 涉黑

LCPDPU.original:
-South Bohan based drug dealer.
-Believed to be involved in the sale of large quantities of cocaine, marijuana, mdma, and ecstasy to street distributors.
-Known to frequent female gyms and tennis courts.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 以South Bohan为据点的毒贩。
- 据信其涉嫌向街头分销商大量销售可卡因、大麻及摇头丸。
- 常去女性健身房和网球场。

LCPDPU.original: Linked to the Ancelotti Crime Syndicate.

-Son of Russian Crime Lord, Kenny Petrovic.
-Because of his father's prominence, often travels with a bodyguard.
-Believed to be attempting to work outside Petrovic's organization with Mikhail Faustin, Russian gangster and owner of the Perestroika Cabaret Club.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 俄系犯罪组织首脑Kenny Petrovic之子。
- 其父的地位导致其通常与一名保镖同行。
- 据信其试图在Petrovic的组织外为Mikhail Faustin工作，后者为俄罗斯黑道兼Perestroika卡巴莱俱乐部的老板。

LCPDPU.original:
1986 - Assault
1989 - Possession Controlled Substance: Heroin
1992 - Promoting Prostitution
1996 - Promoting Prostitution
2000 - Possession Controlled Substance: Heroin
2005 - Assault and Battery
LCPDPU.translated:

LCPDPU.original: Linked to Russian Organized Crime Syndicates throughout Liberty City.
LCPDPU.translated: 与自由城的俄罗斯系犯罪组织有联系

1991 - Possession Controlled Substance: Crack Cocaine

LCPDPU.original: Linked to South American Prostitution Rings in Alderney.
LCPDPU.translated: 与Alderney的南美系性交易圈有联系

LCPDPU.original:
-Believed to be the kingpin of Russian Organized Crime in Liberty City, if not the whole United States.
-Arrived in the US in the 1980s on an Israeli passport though this was confiscated when evidence came to light that he did not, as previously claimed, have a Jewish grandmother.
-Involved in all types of criminal activity.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 据信其为自由城的俄罗斯系犯罪组织的头目。
- 于20世纪80年代持以色列护照进入美国，当有证据指出其并无其所谓的犹太祖母时，此护照被没收。
- 涉嫌参与各种种类的犯罪活动。

LCPDPU.original:
1998 - Possession Stolen Property
2000 - Petty Larceny
2002 - Possession Gambling Records
2003 - Kidnapping
LCPDPU.translated:
1998 - 持有赃物
2000 - 小额盗窃
2002 - 组织赌博
2003 - 绑架

LCPDPU.original:
-AKA Playboy X.
-Part of Dwayne Forge's crack cocaine dealing operation.
-Assumed control after Forge's conviction.
-Believed to have run the business with advice from Forge in prison.
-Reported that Stewart stopped visiting Forge at the penitentiary in 2004.
-Now believed to be head of a cocaine distribution network in North Holland.
-Some attempts to move into legitimate business interests.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 又名Playboy X。
- Dwayne Forge的霹雳可卡因贩卖组织的成员。
- 推测其在Forge被定罪后接手组织。
- 据信其听取狱中的Forge的建议管理毒品生意。
- 报告指出Stewart于2004年不再拜访被监禁的Forge。
- 据信其现在为North Holland的可卡因销售网络头目。
- 尝试转向合法商业经营。

LCPDPU.original:
1985 - Tax Evasion
1996 - Possession Controlled Substance: Cocaine
1999 - Public Lewdness
LCPDPU.translated:
1985 - 逃税
1996 - 持有管制物质：可卡因
1999 - 流氓行为

LCPDPU.original: Known Associate of the Lost OMG.
LCPDPU.translated: 失落非法机车俱乐部的同伙

LCPDPU.original:
-Works as a presenter on the TV show 'The Men's Room'.
-History of lewd behavior and disorderly conduct.
-Arrested in Middle Park in 2006 playing Ultimate Disk In The Dark with 11 other naked men.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 电视节目《男子更衣室》主持人。
- 有故意裸露私处与扰乱社会治安的历史。
- 于2006年因与11名裸体男性共同游玩「漆黑终极飞盘」被捕。
1999 - 持有管制物质：霹雳可卡因

LCPDPU.original:
1999 - Driving While Intoxicated
2003 - Possession Stolen Property
Linked to Italian American Organized Crime.
LCPDPU.translated: 与意大利系犯罪组织有联系

LCPDPU.original:
-Believed to be accountant to the Lupisella Crime Syndicate.
-Rumored that his half-Jewish ancestry prevents him from being fully inducted into the family.
-His accounting work for the Lupisellas has meant that they are the only Liberty City Crime syndicate that the Federal Government has been unable to charge with tax irregularities.
-Spent 349 days in 2002 only communicating through spreadsheets because he was concerned about surveillance devices. Detectives were unable to export the correct macros and no evidence could be gathered during this period.
LCPDPU.translated:
- 据信其为Lupisella犯罪家族的会计。
- 据说其半犹太的血统让他无法完全被家族接纳。
- 其为Lupisella家族做的账致使Lupisella家族成为了唯一一个联邦政府无法以涉税犯罪起诉的自由城犯罪组织。
- 为防备监视设备，其2002年有349天只用电子表格沟通。探员无法导出正确数据，此时期内未能收集到任何证据。

LCPDPU.translated:
1997 - 汽车盗窃
1999 - 过失杀人
2005 - 持有管制物质：冰毒

LCPDPU.original:
1997 - Possession Stolen Property
2000 - Clean Diamond Act Violation
LCPDPU.translated:
1997 - 持有赃物
